thread.title: NYC trial starts for NBA player charged in clash with police
thread.title_full: NYC trial starts for NBA player charged in clash with police

title: NYC trial starts for NBA player charged in clash with police
text:
> Indiana NYC trial starts for NBA player charged in clash with police FILE - In this photo from Saturday, April 4, 2015, Atlanta Hawks forward Thabo Sefolosha plays during an NBA basketball game in Atlanta. Sefolosha plans to fight charges he blocked officers from setting up a crime scene following the stabbing of Indiana Pacers' Chris Copeland outside a trendy Manhattan nightclub in April. (AP Photo/John Amis, File)
